overview: You guys have been begging for a video featuring our new sexy young soldier, Damien (our new Toy Soldier). Well, one of our old favorites, Zack, came back to the fold a few weeks ago and I teamed him up with Cole and Damien for his first video in over three years and Damien's first video ever. Damien took a royal fucking from Cole in this video and puts on one hell of a hot solo performance as well. Once I got Cole, Damien and Zack together one Saturday afternoon for some fun we got a huge surprise. Not only did Damien take on Cole for his first time getting fucked...but Zack joins the ranks of those that have touched their toes for King Cole. Damien is a hot little soldier that takes a cock really well and he proves just how well in his debut performance.
